name: "Azeroth's Greatest BEE.E.O." Cap
description: This item was, in fact, "passed down" from the previous BEE.E.O..

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 556,151 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 265,054.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 691,560, and grants you up to 10,397 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Nasz'uro, the Unbound Legacy
